name: Scarlet Lake
storyline:
After his wife never returns from a research project in the town on Scarlet Lake, Ben Murphy begins to believe that something sinister is going on. Taking it upon himself to find out the truth he heads for the town, but nothing can prepare him for what he is about to find.

Scavenge the derelict town for supplies, utilising whatever you can to survive. With limited inventory space you will have to be smart about what you choose to keep and what's necessary to keep pushing forward.
summary: Delve into a retro survival horror where everything is not what it seems. You control Ben Murphy, a detective sent to investigate the strange on-goings in a small town, only to be caught in a nightmare surrounded by terrifying creatures. What dark mysteries will you uncover in Scarlet Lake?
